results.title: Where Are Their Heads? Hordes of Ancient Statues Pose That Puzzle
results.abstract: Many museums would like to match their headless torsos with their missing heads, but as a debate between Turkey and a Danish institution makes clear, it’s not always so easy.

media.caption: As often as not, the ancient statues on display in museums around the world have lost their heads, as is the case in this gallery at the Ny Carlsberg Glyptotek in Copenhagen.
media.copyright: Charlotte de la Fuente for The New York Times

results.title: These Wheels Can Handle Sand and Surf. Grab the Sunscreen.
results.abstract: Wheelchairs with balloon-like tires are available at a growing number of U.S. beaches, giving disabled people and their families more options for fun in the sun.
